comments: Tests covering the single shard changelog stream query smoke cases.

tests.name: append-only inner/left join changelog(table)) inner/left join versioned_kv(all primary join)
tests.description: append-only inner/left join changelog(table)) inner/left join versioned_kv(all primary join)

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream1_2
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream2_2
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream3_2
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream1_2 (i int, k1 int, k2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream2_2 (j int, kk1 int, kk2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream3_2 (k int, kkk1 int, kkk2 string) primary key (kkk1, kkk2) settings mode='versioned_kv'

select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2, c.k, c.kkk1, c.kkk2, _tp_delta from test14_append_stream1_2 as a inner all join changelog(test14_append_stream2_2, kk1, kk2) as b on a.k1 = b.kk1 and a.k2 = b.kk2 inner all join test14_append_stream3_2 as c on b.kk1 = c.kkk1 and b.kk2 = c.kkk2;
insert into test14_append_stream3_2(k, kkk1, kkk2) values (3, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_2(j, kk1, kk2) values (2, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream1_2(i, k1, k2) values (1, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_2(j, kk1, kk2) values (4, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream3_2(k, kkk1, kkk2) values (5, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream1_2(i, k1, k2) values (1, 1, 'k')

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream1_2
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream2_2

create stream if not exists test14_append_stream1_2 (i int, k1 int, k2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream2_2 (j int, kk1 int, kk2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream3_2 (k int, kkk1 int, kkk2 string) primary key (kkk1, kkk2) settings mode='versioned_kv'

select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2, c.k, c.kkk1, c.kkk2, _tp_delta from test14_append_stream1_2 as a inner all join changelog(test14_append_stream2_2, kk2) as b on a.k1 = b.kk1 inner all join test14_append_stream3_2 as c on b.kk2 = c.kkk2
insert into test14_append_stream3_2(k, kkk1, kkk2) values (3, 2, 'k2')

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream1_2

create stream if not exists test14_append_stream1_2 (i int, k1 int, k2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream2_2 (j int, kk1 int, kk2 string) primary key(kk1, kk2) settings mode='versioned_kv'
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream3_2 (k int, kkk1 int, kkk2 string) primary key (kkk1, kkk2) settings mode='versioned_kv'

select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2, c.k, c.kkk1, c.kkk2, _tp_delta from test14_append_stream1_2 as a inner all join test14_append_stream2_2 as b on a.k1 = b.kk1 and a.k2 = b.kk2 inner all join test14_append_stream3_2 as c on b.kk1 = c.kkk1 and b.kk2 = c.kkk2
insert into test14_append_stream3_2(k, kkk1, kkk2) values (3, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_2(j, kk1, kk2) values (2, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream1_2(i, k1, k2) values (1, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_2(j, kk1, kk2) values (4, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream3_2(k, kkk1, kkk2) values (5, 1, 'k');

select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2, c.k, c.kkk1, c.kkk2, _tp_delta from test14_append_stream1_2 as a inner all join test14_append_stream2_2 as b on a.i = b.j inner all join test14_append_stream3_2 as c on b.kk2 = c.kkk2

tests.name: changelog(table) global Aggregation without group by
tests.description: changelog(table) global Aggregation without group by

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream_2
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream_2 (id int, name string, val float, ts datetime)
select count(), min(val), max(val), sum(val), avg(val) from changelog(test14_append_stream_2, id, name) emit periodic 1s
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'b', 33.3 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:05')

tests.name: append_only Window Aggregation without group by
tests.description: append_only Window Aggregation with group by

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream_2
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream_2 (id int, name string, val float, ts datetime)
select id, count(), min(val), max(val), sum(val), avg(val), window_start, window_end from tumble(test14_append_stream_2, ts, 5s) group by id, window_start, window_end
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'a', 11.1 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:01')
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (2, 'a', 22.2 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:01')
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'b', 33.3 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:02')
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (2, 'b', 44.4 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:03')
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'a', 44.4 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:04')
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'c', 22.2 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:05')
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream_2
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream_2 (id int, name string, val float, ts datetime)
with subquery as (select * from changelog(test14_append_stream_2, id, name))select id, count(*), min(val), max(val) from subquery group by id emit periodic 1s
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'a', 11.1 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:00')
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'b', 22.2 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:02')
insert into test14_append_stream_2 (id, name, val, ts) values (1, 'a', 33.3 ,'2020-02-02 20:00:04')
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream_2
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream_2 (id int, name string, val float, ts datetime)

with subquery as (select id, count() as cnt, min(val) as min_val, max(val) as max_val from changelog(test14_append_stream_2, id, name) group by id)select count(*), sum(cnt), min(min_val), max(max_val) from subquery
